title: Adaptive Learning Design Workshop Based on Multimodal Learning Analytics (MMLA)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning analytics and experience with digital educational tools
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals with over three years of experience in education, targeting learners interested in learning data analysis and personalized instructional design.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of MMLA (integrated analysis of behavioral, cognitive, and interaction data) and apply them to actual educational cases
Learners can plan a data analysis process for adaptive learning design using the Data-Pedagogy Alignment Framework
Learners can interpret multimodal data collected in an LMS-based learning environment and establish personalized learner feedback strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
